scripts.prepare.shared.mobile: npm run prepare.shared && cd subular-mobile && npm install && npm install
scripts.android: npm run prepare.shared.mobile && cd subular-mobile && tns run android
scripts.ios: npm run prepare.shared.mobile && cd subular-mobile && tns run ios
scripts.ios.webpack: npm run prepare.shared.mobile && cd subular-mobile && npm run start-ios-bundle
